title: The Mist
author: Stephen King
description: A gripping novella about a mysterious mist that envelops a small town, trapping a group of residents in a supermarket with terrifying creatures lurking outside.

title: The Murder of Roger Ackroyd
author: Agatha Christie
description: A revolutionary crime novel by Agatha Christie, featuring Hercule Poirot, who has retired to a quiet village to grow vegetable marrows, only to be drawn into a murder investigation that challenges the very nature of the detective story.

title: Verity
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A struggling writer accepts a job offer to complete the remaining books of a successful series, but she uncovers the chilling autobiography of the injured author, filled with dark secrets that could devastate the family.
